knit 1 20 stitches row 13 purl 20 row 14 knit 1 increase 1 knit 16 increase 1 knit 1 22 stitches row 15 purl 22 row 16 knit 1 increase 1 knit 18 increase 1 knit 1 24 stitches row 17 purl 24 place a stitch marker on your work on the left and right side of the work at this row this will help later on row 18 knit 24 row 19 purl 24 row 20-57 repeat row 18 and 19 you will repeat this 19 times there will be 37 row of plain knitting from the stitch marker you placed at row 20 placing a stitch marker every 10 row may help ending on a purl side row place a stitch marker on your work on the left and right side of row 57 this will help later time to start decreasing we use two different decreases intentionally ssk slip slip knit naturally leans to the left k2tog knit 2 together naturally leans to the right doing it this way helps it to look more even and put together row 58 knit 1 ssk slip slip knit knit 18 k2tog knit 2 together knit 1 22 stitches row 59 purl 22 row 60 knit 1 ssk knit 16 k2tog knit 1 20 stitches row 61 purl 20 row 62 knit 1 ssk knit 14 k2tog knit 1 18 stitches row 63 purl 18 row 64 knit 1 ssk knit 12 k2tog knit 1 16 stitches row 65 purl 16 row 66 knit 1 ssk knit 10 k2tog knit 1 14 stitches row 67 purl 14 row 68 knit 1 ssk knit 8 k2tog knit 1 12 stitches row 69 purl 12 row 70 knit 1 ssk knit 6 k2tog knit 1 10 stitches row 71 purl 10 row 72 knit 1 ssk knit 4 k2tog knit 1 8 stitches row 73 purl 8 picking up stitches time this isn t as scary as it looks i promise you can do the scoop it up method with your needle method or grab a crochet hook and scoop them up that way using whatever method you are comfortable with place stitches on the left needle it is important to place them on the left needle to ensure you are following the pattern as it is written this is where having those stitch markers placed comes in handy use a point protector on your right needle so your stitches stay on make sure to turn your work so that you are looking at the knit stitches this is your right side you may need to create a space if it s hard to see when you need to be pick up stitches as follows ~place a
